Method Detail

sendRedirect

void sendRedirect(Form form,
                  String path,
                  org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletResponse response)
                  throws IOException,
                         org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException
Issues a 302 redirect with the form serialized into a JSON object that can be read out by the PostRedirectGetFormHelper on the "other side". Allows 302 redirect to target the specified path.

path -
response -
